events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the software engineer position with a detailed resume and cover letter outlining their experience.
Application has been reviewed and categorised under the engineering department considering the candidateâ€™s developer background and skill set.
Recruiter John Smith has been assigned to manage the recruitment process for this software engineer candidate.
Conducted the initial screening call with the candidate; they demonstrated strong foundational knowledge of software development principles.
The candidate promptly responded to the screening feedback, expressing enthusiasm and confirming availability for the technical interview.
Technical interview has been scheduled for May 5th at 10:00 AM with the lead developer to evaluate coding skills and problem-solving ability.
Candidate completed the technical interview successfully, solving algorithms problems and demonstrating strong coding proficiency in the required languages.
HR interview is scheduled for May 7th to discuss company culture fit, benefits, and candidate expectations.
HR interview completed where the candidate showed strong alignment with company values and expressed enthusiasm about joining the engineering team.
An official job offer was proposed to the candidate outlining salary, benefits, and onboarding details for the software engineer position.
Candidate responded positively to the offer, requested some clarifications on benefits, and expressed eagerness to start.
Candidate formally accepted the job offer and confirmed their start date for onboarding in two weeks.
Onboarding process initiated with the new software engineer, including access setup, orientation, and team introductions.
Recruitment process successfully closed; the candidate is now officially hired and fully integrated into the engineering team.
